movies.title: In Search of the Great Beast 666: Aleister Crowley
movies.plot: Aleister Crowley was the most well known and influential occult magician of modern times. His admirers saw him as the prophet of a new age. His detractors denounced him as a Satanist, a drug addict and a sex maniac. The Great Beast, as he called himself, continues to be an influence on the spiritual world today.

biography.bio: Neil Charnaud is an actor, known for In Search of the Great Beast 666: Aleister Crowley (2007), This Is J03 (2008) and My Secret Agent Auntie (2008).
biography.name: Neil Charnaud

biography.bio: Colm Feore was born on August 22, 1958 in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Thor (2011), The Chronicles of Riddick (2004) and The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014). He has been married to Donna Feore since 1994. They have two children. He was previously married to Sidonie Boll.
biography.name: Colm Feore
